summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to transportation capital projects; amending the 2004 budget and the 2004-2009 Capital Improvement Program to reduce authorized spending on the Mercer Corridor Project and authorize spending on other transportation capital projects.
vote: 1-8 (Yes: Licata; No: Compton, Conlin, Della, Dragp, Godden, McIver, Rasmussen, Steinbrueck)
